content: materials 4 skeins of purl soho s good wool 1 100% andean highland wool yarn each skein of this sport- to light worsted/dk-weight yarn is approximately 383 yards/ 100 grams - color a 2 skeins approximately 690 total yards required we used teal twilight - color b 2 skeins approximately 670 total yards required we used fresh loganberry you ll also need - us 6 4 mm 32-inch circular needles 2 - removable stitch markers 3 - stitch holders 4 or scrap yarn gauge 22 stitches and 44 row 22 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch size - finished length of wingspan 64 inches - finished length of each short side 46 inches - finished height from center of wingspan to bottom tip of triangle 32 inches designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 5 see even more of hiromi s work on her instagram 6 1 https //www purlsoho com/good-wool html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/l/collection-filter stitch-holders/type-filter knitting-crochet html 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 6 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
